Public Remarks: Older farm home on 5 acres of pristine farm land. Situated on Nicomen Island just 10 minutes from Mission City, this high, dry land is currently used for fodder and grain. Farm Tax Assessment is in place. Surrounded by dairy farms and distant mountains, this is some of the highest-producing dairy land in Canada. There is a Quonset Hut-style workshop and an old blacksmith shop on the property, and the sand point well produces plenty of good water; the pump was replaced fairly recently. This is a property on which a family could easily become self-sufficient. Located on a quiet, dead-end road, the home is currently rented to excellent long-term tenants. Please call for a private viewing.
Realtor Remarks: Home is tenant occupied. 24 hour notice required for showings. Please do not give out address for a drive by. Drawing of land in documents. Measurements  were provided by the tenant and should be verified if important to buyer. Appliances belong to tenants.

The craftmanship continues upstairs with 4 bedrooms with gorgeous walnut flooring and ensuite baths. Family and friends can gather downstairs in the open home theatre with a custom design bar, wine cellar, and a flex area that can be used as a guest bedroom. Schools, parks, transit and shopping are all minutes away. UBC is a short drive away! 2/5/10 National Home Warranty.

Public Remarks: KITS POINT, highly sought after location! Welcome to McNicoll Avenue, one block from Kits beach. Step out for your walk and enjoy the beautiful vista. When only the best will do, this is the place. Invest, hold, renovate or build your dream home. Public Remarks: A majestic Tuscan Villa inspired estate home in the heart of the Fraser Valley, 30736 Burgess Avenue is the epitome of rural and urban living at its finest. This stunning property offers the finest architecture, both inside and out, with luxurious touches at every turn, all surrounded by rolling hills and set in a secluded area to ensure privacy. Even so, the owners of this magnificent home are still within minutes of local amenities including schools, shopping, restaurants, and wineries, while a short 5-10 minute drive reveals larger conveniences, access to major transportation lines, and the Abbotsford International Airport. It is the ideal location for those who wish to embrace a rural environment minutes away from an urban landscape and a 45 minute drive to Vancouver
Realtor Remarks: Buyer's Agent Co-op Commission is 1.5% of Selling price.

Public Remarks: This 5,600 sq/ft Kadenwood estate property is perched high above the Whistler Valley and is truly impressive. Kadenwood is an exclusive ski-in/ski-out neighbourhood that is surrounded by spectacular old growth forests while offering astounding Coastal Range views and its very own private gondola. Here you can have your own private, slope side sanctuary while being just a short 4 minute gondola ride down to Whistler Creekside where there are plenty of restaurant, shopping and recreation options! Throughout the 3 stories of this masterpiece chalet you will find 5 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms including your very own steam room, 1 wood burning and 3 natural gas burning fireplaces, media room, wine room and a vast 3 car garage.
